channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Nexpose hardware appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Nexpose hardware appliance

item.title: CVE-2017-5243|2024-08-05T14:55:35.807Z -- rapid7 -- nexpose%20hardware%20appliance
item.description: The default SSH configuration in Rapid7 Nexpose hardware appliances shipped before June 2017 does not specify desired algorithms for key exchange and other important functions. As a result, it falls back to allowing ALL algorithms supported by the relevant version of OpenSSH and makes the installations vulnerable to a range of MITM, downgrade, and decryption attacks.
